comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm not even gonna watch this video, I just saw the thumbnail and had to give the answer that everyone already knows "Because they're underpaid and undervalued"
I wish I could quit this year...😩not my time to retire yet...
What about us? Doctors? How will the healthcare work if we work from home or work 4_5 hours only?

Our need is less greed is endless. More people are getting aware now to use minimum resources for sustainable growth and development. Simplicity brings togetherness and love. Technologies are also replacing manpower. Humans have to play larger role now.
People are tired of working to make someone else rich while they are barely making ends meet.
Akilesh TV like this video... Super... Amazing... Keep it up
Best news ever , we always need this type of analysis.

The ‘sweet spot’ — or the answer to “What should I do?” — is where (1) your personal dreams & interests, (2) your acquired knowledge, honed talents & seasoned experience, and (3) what is available or needed (opportunities in the marketplace) overlap & converge.
